name: LD30 -The Great Space Salad
description:
Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 30 game jam (Theme: Connected Worlds).

Attempt to save the connected planets from starvation by finding the great space salad.

I used the open beta of Unity 4.6 so you may need to update your web player or try the standalone builds if the web player it isn't working right for you. Also note that the Linux and OSX builds are untested.
